title: Hats off to you
content: 5/5 on the mum-scale. I wish my mum was as cool as you. Your kids must be so lucky!

title: Bread recipe
content: I was walking by your house when I smelled the most incredible sourdough bread. DELICIOUS! What is your recipe???

title: Bringing up children
content: How do you make bringing up kids look so easy? Are you using ChatGPT and, if so, what are your favourite prompts?

title: Sponsorship opportunity
content: Hi, we're looking for a smart, capable, beautiful Mum to display on the front of 'Mum Annual'. I'm sure you've heard of our magazine! Anyway, we'd love to feature you - let me know if you're interested!

title: The Mum Awards
content: On behalf of the Mum Awards, we are delighted to share that you will be recieving the Mum 2024 award - congratulations! Our private jet will arrive soon to pick you up. Bon voyage!

title: Gardening Tips
content: Whatever I do, I just can't get my peach trees to fruit. I don't know what's going on! I have heard that you are the go-to person for fruit growing and general garden tips... Can you help?

title: From Time Magazine?!
content: Hi there! I think I just saw you in Time magazine as one of the most influential women of the decade!! Love what you're doing
